scripts.predebug:start: npm run create:config && npm run debug:stop
scripts.debug:build: npm run create:config && node transformPackageJson.js && docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.combine.yml -f docker-compose.yml build
scripts.debug:start: node transformPackageJson.js && docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.combine.yml -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build && docker logs -f shopping-cart_shopping-cart_1
